description: Lancashire sign all-rounder Ashton Turner for the first eight games of the 2025 T20 Blast.
title: Ashton Turner: Lancashire sign all-rounder for T20 Blast
title_page: Ashton Turner: Lancashire sign all-rounder for T20 Blast - BBC Sport
maintext:
Lancashire have signed all-rounder Ashton Turner for the first eight games of the 2025 T20 Blast competition.
The 31-year-old Australian, who will also be available for County Championship matches, has spent the past three seasons playing for Durham in 20-over cricket.
He has also played for Manchester Originals in The Hundred in both 2022 and 2023.
